Row.Value: Staff loan & education loans. Small business loans in the area of food & beverage, retail grocery shop, agriculture except cattle trade, meat shop, barber shop, livestock, transportation such as taxi/bus runs. Fishing loans, small scale enviromental or alternative energy loan, restaurants, and any other small scale empreneur/business loan.

Residential (housing) loan, forestry loan for the extraction and sale of timber/logwood, cattle trade loan, consultancy business loan, Medical Business/pharmacy loan, Freight business loan, and mining & exploration loan.  Loan to medium size business in the construction/hardware, communication, tourism, manufactoring, eviromental or alternative energy industry.

Large loans to establish hotel & resort business, manufacturing business, Construction/hardware business, supermarket, gas station, Infrastructure and commercial buildings.  Loan for the establishment of any other large scale business in line with DFC's risk appetite.
